ModMetaData.name: Simple Recycling
ModMetaData.author: Arvkus, Proxyer, Lanilor
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>Simple Recycling</size> A simple mod that adds: - "Recycle Apparel" research project. - "Recycle Neolithic Apparel" bill at crafting spot. - "Recycle Apparel" bill at tailoring workbench.
<size=20>Info</size> - This mod is rewritten with C# patching to fix issues introduced in the 1.5 Rimworld version. - Neolithic apparel recycling is not locked behind any research. - Materials returned are 25% of the original apparel value (same as smelting). - If apparel does not have a recipe, no materials are returned. - Only non-smeltable apparel can be recycled.
<color><size=20>Translations</size></color> English, Japanese
